trans-unit.source: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an audit rule for a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 表示存取控制項目 (ACE) 的抽象概念，其定義管道的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged.
trans-unit.target: 稽核規則會決定何時以及如何記錄系統物件上執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule> class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule>類別代表基礎存取控制項目 (ACE)，指定使用者帳戶，以提供 （讀取、 寫入和等等），存取類型的抽象概念，以及是否要進行稽核。

trans-unit.source: This class can specify how audit rules are inherited from and propagated to objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會指定如何繼承自和傳播到物件稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: To allow file auditing on computers that are running Windows NT or later operating systems, the Audit Access Security policy must be enabled; by default, this policy is set to **No Auditing**.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓執行 Windows NT 或更新版本的作業系統的電腦上的稽核檔案，必須啟用稽核存取安全性原則。根據預設，此原則設定為**沒有稽核**。

trans-unit.source: To enable the Audit Access Security policy, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用稽核存取安全性原則，請執行下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Click the **Start** button and then point to **All Programs**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**啟動**按鈕，然後指向**所有程式**。

trans-unit.source: Point to **Administrative Tools** and then click **Local Security Policy**.
trans-unit.target: 指向**系統管理工具**，然後按一下 **本機安全性原則**。

trans-unit.source: In the Local Security Settings window, expand the Local Policies folder and left-click the Audit Policy folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 [本機安全性設定] 視窗中，展開 [本機原則] 資料夾，以滑鼠左鍵按一下 [稽核原則] 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Double-click the **Audit object access** entry in the right pane of the Local Security Settings window to display the **Audit object access Properties** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下**稽核物件存取**以顯示 本機安全性設定 視窗的右窗格中的項目**稽核物件存取屬性** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Select the **Success** or **Failure** boxes to log successes or failures.
trans-unit.target: 選取**成功**或**失敗**方塊，以記錄成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: Note that an audit rule for a user account requires a corresponding access rule for the same user account.
trans-unit.target: 請注意使用者帳戶的稽核規則，需要有對應的存取規則，對相同的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule> class to create a new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule>類別來建立新的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: You can persist this rule using the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保存此規則使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，封裝使用者帳戶的參考。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> 值，可指定與存取規則有關聯的作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值，可指定何時要執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> class for a user account specified in a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> 物件中指定的使用者帳戶，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that can be persisted using the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立使用保存的稽核規則<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity>類別。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged.
trans-unit.target: 稽核規則會決定何時以及如何記錄系統物件上執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user account.
trans-unit.target: 使用者帳戶的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> 值，可指定與存取規則有關聯的作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值，可指定何時要執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> class for a named user account.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具名使用者帳戶之 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that can be persisted using the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立使用保存的稽核規則<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity>類別。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged.
trans-unit.target: 稽核規則會決定何時以及如何記錄系統物件上執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> flags that are associated with the current <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得與目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> 物件相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule" /> 旗標。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights" /> 值的位元組合。
